entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
